scenes.background: Bob leans back, sighing deeply, looking frustrated.
scenes.description: 'Alex, your rush doesn't account for potential pitfalls. Can't we be more thorough?'

options.text: Alex, Bob has a point. Maybe we should balance speed with caution.
options.analysis: You acknowledge Bob’s concern while still addressing Alex's urgency, showing good self-regulation and social skill.

options.text: Bob, I get your point, but Alex's approach could save us time. Let's compromise.
options.analysis: You propose a middle ground, showing empathy towards both viewpoints and motivation to keep the project moving.

options.text: Bob, sometimes quick decisions are necessary. We can't always afford to be thorough.
options.analysis: You emphasize the need for quick decisions, showing good perception of the situation but lower empathy towards Bob’s concerns.
